hero.title: End vibe-coding. Ship secure, auditable releases.
hero.description: Speckit turns compliance from a scramble into a continuous, developer-native loop. Govern specs, orchestrate policy gates, and ship evidence on demand.

features.title: Governed spec loop
features.description: Model architecture decisions, risk reviews, and policy checks in a living spec that maps to every commit.

features.title: Policy gates
features.description: Codify approvals across CI/CD, infrastructure, and runtime with reusable controls and transparent history.

features.title: Continuous evidence
features.description: Generate SBOMs, attestations, and RTMs automatically so audits, customer reviews, and leadership updates are no-drama.

workflows.title: Speckit centralizes governance without slowing flow
workflows.description: Replace spreadsheets, ad hoc approvals, and one-off attestations. Speckit codifies governance into developer workflows, then feeds evidence to the people and systems that need it.

items.name: Risk-aware release approvals
items.description: Dynamic checklists tied to spec changes, risk posture, and policy owners.

items.name: Supply chain attestation
items.description: SLSA-aligned attestations from source to deploy, with artifact lineage graphing.

items.name: Control reporting
items.description: Real-time dashboards for SOC 2, ISO 27001, HIPAA, and FedRAMP evidence gaps.

checklist: ✔ Security controls verified against CIS profiles

alignment.title: All teams see the same source of truth
alignment.description: Platform, security, compliance, and product leaders collaborate in a shared context. Speckit syncs with GitHub, Jira, ServiceNow, and Supabase so your data stays where work already happens.

cards.title: Spec-first workflows
cards.description: Tie every requirement to implementation and validation in one place.

cards.title: Compliance-ready APIs
cards.description: Push evidence to GRC suites, customer trust portals, and ticketing systems.

cards.title: Shared Supabase core
cards.description: Marketing and product leads flow into one RLS-protected Supabase dataset.

cards.title: Developer-native UX
cards.description: CLI, GitHub Actions, and APIs that meet engineers in their existing workflows.
